explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of neural network algorithms (SOM and LSTM) for analyzing financial time series, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper uses SOM (Self Organizing Maps), which is an unsupervised learning algorithm, for clustering phase track parts.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using SOM neural network to cluster phase track parts.
explanations.neural network: The paper discusses the use of SOM and LSTM neural networks for analyzing and predicting financial time series.
explanations.deep learning: The use of LSTM, a type of deep learning model, is mentioned for testing the results of clustering.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses LSTM to test the results of clustering in the financial time series analysis.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly mentions using LSTM (long short-term memory) as part of the methodology.
